igfetchr: Access the IG Trading REST API

Source: R/igfetchr-package.R
igfetchr-package.Rd

igfetchr provides a small set of beginner-friendly functions to authenticate with and fetch market data, historical prices, account details, options positions, and execute trades from the IG Trading REST API (https://labs.ig.com/). All functions return tidy tibbles for straightforward analysis.

Details

Disclaimer: Trading CFDs, spread bets, and options carries a high risk of losing money. This package provides data access and trade execution functionality only and is not financial or trading advice.
